      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceAgent Service.getAgent()
      Gets the agent corresponding to this service.
      ServiceAgent Context.getServiceAgent()
      Get the current service agent responsible for executing the service.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Service.onStart(ServiceAgent agent, java.util.logging.Logger logger)

    • Uses of ServiceAgent in i5.las2peer.p2p

      Methods in i5.las2peer.p2p with parameters of type ServiceAgent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void EthereumNode.announceServiceDeployment(ServiceAgent serviceAgent)
      Announce deployment of the service associated with this service agent using the service registry.
      void EthereumNode.announceServiceDeploymentEnd(ServiceAgent serviceAgent)
      Announce end of deployment (i.e., shutdown) of the service associated with this service agent using the service registry.

    • Uses of ServiceAgent in i5.las2peer.security

      Classes in i5.las2peer.security that implement ServiceAgent

      class  ServiceAgentImpl
      A service agent represents a service and its access rights in the las2peer setting.
